content.rendered:
To report unauthorized uses of the Illuminati name, or solicitations for money from people purporting to represent our organization, please use the form below.

[formcraft id=’2′]

excerpt.rendered: To report unauthorized uses of the Illuminati name, or solicitations for money from people purporting to represent our organization, please use the form below. [formcraft id='2']
